text:
1. Yay better archiving!

2. Fellow Pinboard users: I have a script that looks at your Pinboard bookmarks, and saves the nicely formatted AO3 downloads for everything you’ve saved (ebook, HTML, PDF, etc.).

Anybody interested in that? https://t.co/2vsEnXv11k

quoted_status.text: If you use Pinboard and archive AO3 links, I'm recrawling a bunch that didn't get stored right. There was a nasty silent bug where a Ubuntu update made the crawler unable to speak the same dialect of SSL as AO3's server. This will also retroactively fix adult content warnings.
